snippet.title: Ball Game - Gameplay Trailer | New Rage-Platformer Game
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3550920/Ball_Game/?beta=0
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/NSF_Chan
Support us on Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/NSF_Chan/
Join our Discord - https://discord.com/invite/qSy4EVY9
Watch us on YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/@nsf_chan

Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping experience with Ball Game! This rage-platformer game will test your skills and reflexes. Watch the trailer now!

Control the ball in first person and try not to get motion sick! A movement system that is so relentless, unexpected and fun will put your gaming skills to the ultimate test!

Prepare to get angry, laugh and cry as you race for the ball in an adventure that is challenging to play but impossible to put down. 

Are you ready for the challenge?

#ballgame #trailer
